mapper.insert:
select max(sellerCommunityNumber) from fc_sellerCommunity;
insert into fc_sellerCommunity( sellerNumber, sellerCommunityImage, sellerCommunityTitle, sellerCommunityContent, sellerCommunityVisitCount ) values( #{sellerNumber}, #{sellerCommunityImage}, #{sellerCommunityTitle}, #{sellerCommunityContent}, 0 )
mapper.select: select * from fc_seller fs inner join fc_sellerCommunity fsc on fs.sellerNumber =fsc.sellerNumber where fsc.sellerCommunityNumber=#{sellerCommunityNumber}

select s.sellerCommunityNumber, s.sellerNumber, s.sellerCommunityImage, s.sellerCommunityTitle, s.sellerCommunityContent, s.sellerCommunityVisitCount, CASE WHEN FLOOR(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, s.sellerCommunityCreatedAt, NOW()) / 12) >= 1 THEN CONCAT(FLOOR(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, s.sellerCommunityCreatedAt, NOW()) / 12), '년전') WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, s.sellerCommunityCreatedAt, NOW()) >= 1 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, s.sellerCommunityCreatedAt, NOW()), '달전') WHEN DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE, s.sellerCommunityCreatedAt) >= 1 THEN CONCAT(DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE, s.sellerCommunityCreatedAt), '일전') WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, s.sellerCommunityCreatedAt, NOW()) >= 1 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, s.sellerCommunityCreatedAt, NOW()), '시간전') ELSE CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, s.sellerCommunityCreatedAt, NOW()), '분전') end as sellerCommunityCreatedAt, (select count(*) from fc_sellerCommunityLike fsc where fsc.sellerCommunityNumber=s.sellerCommunityNumber) as heart from fc_sellerCommunity s
and s.sellerCommunityTitle like concat('%',#{searchWord},'%')
and s.sellerNumber in
#{seller}
order by
s.sellerCommunityCreatedAt desc
s.sellerCommunityVisitCount desc
heart desc
s.sellerCommunityCreatedAt DESC
limit #{offset},#{itemsPerPage}

select sellerCommunityNumber, sellerNumber, sellerCommunityImage, sellerCommunityTitle, sellerCommunityContent, sellerCommunityVisitCount, CASE WHEN FLOOR(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, sellerCommunityCreatedAt, NOW()) / 12) >= 1 THEN CONCAT(FLOOR(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, sellerCommunityCreatedAt, NOW()) / 12), '년전') WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, sellerCommunityCreatedAt, NOW()) >= 1 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, sellerCommunityCreatedAt, NOW()), '달전') WHEN DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE, sellerCommunityCreatedAt) >= 1 THEN CONCAT(DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE, sellerCommunityCreatedAt), '일전') WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, sellerCommunityCreatedAt, NOW()) >= 1 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, sellerCommunityCreatedAt, NOW()), '시간전') ELSE CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, sellerCommunityCreatedAt, NOW()), '분전') end as sellerCommunityCreatedAt from fc_sellerCommunity where sellerCommunityNumber=#{sellerCommunityNumber}

select coalesce(count(*),0) from fc_sellerCommunity
and sellerCommunityTitle like concat('%',#{searchWord},'%')
and sellerNumber in
#{seller}
select * from fc_sellerCommunityImageDetail where sellerCommunityNumber=#{sellerCommunityNumber}

select scc.sellerCommunityCommentNumber, scc.sellerCommunityNumber, scc.sellerNumber, scc.sellerCommunityCommentContent, CASE WHEN FLOOR(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, scc.sellerCommunityCommentCreatedAt, NOW()) / 12) >= 1 THEN CONCAT(FLOOR(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, scc.sellerCommunityCommentCreatedAt, NOW()) / 12), '년전') WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, scc.sellerCommunityCommentCreatedAt, NOW()) >= 1 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, scc.sellerCommunityCommentCreatedAt, NOW()), '달전') WHEN DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE, scc.sellerCommunityCommentCreatedAt) >= 1 THEN CONCAT(DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE, scc.sellerCommunityCommentCreatedAt), '일전') WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, scc.sellerCommunityCommentCreatedAt, NOW()) >= 1 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, scc.sellerCommunityCommentCreatedAt, NOW()), '시간전') ELSE CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, scc.sellerCommunityCommentCreatedAt, NOW()), '분전') end as sellerCommunityCommentCreatedAt, fs.* from fc_sellerCommunityComment scc inner join fc_seller fs on scc.sellerNumber =fs.sellerNumber where sellerCommunityNumber=#{sellerCommunityNumber}

select fsc.sellerCommunityReplyNumber, fsc.sellerCommunityCommentNumber, fsc.sellerNumber, fsc.sellerCommunityReplyContent, CASE WHEN FLOOR(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, fsc.sellerCommunityReplyCreatedAt, NOW()) / 12) >= 1 THEN CONCAT(FLOOR(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, fsc.sellerCommunityReplyCreatedAt, NOW()) / 12), '년전') WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, fsc.sellerCommunityReplyCreatedAt, NOW()) >= 1 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, fsc.sellerCommunityReplyCreatedAt, NOW()), '달전') WHEN DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE, fsc.sellerCommunityReplyCreatedAt) >= 1 THEN CONCAT(DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE, fsc.sellerCommunityReplyCreatedAt), '일전') WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, fsc.sellerCommunityReplyCreatedAt, NOW()) >= 1 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, fsc.sellerCommunityReplyCreatedAt, NOW()), '시간전') ELSE CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, fsc.sellerCommunityReplyCreatedAt, NOW()), '분전') end as sellerCommunityReplyCreatedAt, fs.* from fc_sellerCommunityReply fsc inner join fc_seller fs on fsc.sellerNumber =fs.sellerNumber where sellerCommunityCommentNumber=#{sellerCommunityCommentNumber}
select coalesce(count(*),0) from fc_sellerCommunityComment where sellerCommunityNumber=#{sellerCommunityNumber}

select coalesce(count(*),0) from fc_sellerCommunityReply fsr inner join fc_sellerCommunityComment fsc on fsr.sellerCommunityCommentNumber =fsc.sellerCommunityCommentNumber where fsc.sellerCommunityNumber =#{sellerCommunityNumber}
select coalesce(count(*),0) from fc_sellerCommunityReply where sellerCommunityCommentNumber=#{sellerCommunityCommentNumber}
select coalesce(count(*),0) from fc_sellerCommunityLike where sellerCommunityNumber=#{sellerCommunityNumber}
mapper.delete: delete from fc_sellerCommunityLike where sellerCommunityNumber=#{sellerCommunityNumber} and sellerNumber=#{sellerNumber}
mapper.select: select coalesce(count(*),0) from fc_sellerCommunityLike where sellerNumber=#{sellerNumber} and sellerCommunityNumber=#{sellerCommunityNumber}
mapper.insert: insert into fc_sellerCommunityCommentLikeStatus( sellerCommunityCommentNumber, sellerNumber, sellerCommentLikeStatus ) values( #{sellerCommunityCommentNumber}, #{sellerNumber}, '' )
mapper.select: select * from fc_sellerCommunityCommentLikeStatus where sellerCommunityCommentNumber=#{sellerCommunityCommentNumber} and sellerNumber=#{sellerNumber}
select coalesce(count(*),0) from fc_sellerCommunityCommentLikeStatus where sellerCommunityCommentNumber=#{sellerCommunityCommentNumber} and sellerCommentLikeStatus='like'
select coalesce(count(*),0) from fc_sellerCommunityCommentLikeStatus where sellerCommunityCommentNumber=#{sellerCommunityCommentNumber} and sellerCommentLikeStatus='dislike'
mapper.insert: insert into fc_sellerCommunityReplyLikeStatus( sellerCommunityReplyNumber, sellerNumber, sellerCommunityReplyLikeStatus ) values( #{sellerCommunityReplyNumber}, #{sellerNumber}, '' )
mapper.select: select * from fc_sellerCommunityReplyLikeStatus where sellerCommunityReplyNumber=#{sellerCommunityReplyNumber} and sellerNumber=#{sellerNumber}
select coalesce(count(*),0) from fc_sellerCommunityReplyLikeStatus where sellerCommunityReplyNumber=#{sellerCommunityReplyNumber} and sellerCommunityReplyLikeStatus='like'
select coalesce(count(*),0) from fc_sellerCommunityReplyLikeStatus where sellerCommunityReplyNumber=#{sellerCommunityReplyNumber} and sellerCommunityReplyLikeStatus='dislike'

SELECT CASE WHEN DAYNAME(sellerCommunityCreatedAt) = 'Sunday' THEN '일' WHEN DAYNAME(sellerCommunityCreatedAt) = 'Monday' THEN '월' WHEN DAYNAME(sellerCommunityCreatedAt) = 'Tuesday' THEN '화' WHEN DAYNAME(sellerCommunityCreatedAt) = 'Wednesday' THEN '수' WHEN DAYNAME(sellerCommunityCreatedAt) = 'Thursday' THEN '목' WHEN DAYNAME(sellerCommunityCreatedAt) = 'Friday' THEN '금' WHEN DAYNAME(sellerCommunityCreatedAt) = 'Saturday' THEN '토' END AS day_name_korean, COUNT(*) AS count_per_day FROM fc_sellerCommunity GROUP BY DAYNAME(sellerCommunityCreatedAt);

SELECT ( (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM fc_sellerCommunity WHERE sellerNumber = fs.sellerNumber) + (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM fc_sellerCommunityComment WHERE sellerNumber = fs.sellerNumber) + (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM fc_sellerCommunityReply WHERE sellerNumber = fs.sellerNumber) ) as counts, fs.sellerName FROM fc_seller fs ORDER BY counts DESC LIMIT 3;
